text.section:
If the Maryland State Fair remains at the Timonium Fair Grounds, the Comptroller shall pay from the Special Fund an annual grant of:
$500,000 to the Maryland State Fair and Agricultural Society, Inc., to:
promote and enhance the Maryland State Fair; and
maintain and develop youth programs, with premium money provided to organizations, such as 4-H Clubs and the Future Farmers of America, for recognition and awards; and
$50,000 to Baltimore County to replace the money formerly received by the county under this subtitle.
